Posts.Content: Thank you for your response! I feel a lot better knowing there is a glimmer of hope! I'm scared but I will be strong for her and my nephews.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Mets to the Bones

Posts.Content: I'm new to this forum! My sister has stage 4 breast cancer it has spread to liver bone and brain. She has radiation for brain scheduled for Tuesday! I don't live close to her so I'm making plans to visit in the next few weeks. She has been fighting since 2008 but im afraid it's taking over her body
